== Add pages to this Category ==
<nowiki>[[HelpOnCategories|Categories]]</nowiki> are an important way of organizing this wiki. All categories are listed <nowiki>[[CategoryCategory|here]]</nowiki>. Please add categories to pages when some categories are missing.

To add a page to this category, do not edit this page. Edit the page that belongs in this category. Add the category name under four dashes on the last line of the page. 
  Example of adding a page to a category:
  <pre>
----
Category1
  </pre>

To add a page to more than one category, list the category names on one line, separating each category from the other category with a space.

  Example of adding a page to more than one category:
  <pre>
----
Category1 Category2
  </pre>
----
CategoryAddCategory
